steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2d6c8","text":"Set up the reaction mixture in a 1.7 mL Eppendorf tube with   purified LRRK2 protein, 1x kinase buffer with   ATP and   GST-Prescission Protease (to remove the Flag tag).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":108,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":118,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5c3dp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6i5qe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"851m5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.4","error":false,"guid":"0EF717301F8111ED8D75E7A4986267BF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"12E36C901F8111ED8D75E7A4986267BF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.01","error":false,"guid":"B51608B0223311EDA63C0DDE2F502712","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1654}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7d7ts","text":"Note: the LRRK2 protein used in this experiment was obtained by elution from the anti-FLAG M2 resin as described in the LRRK2 purification protocol.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"124sk","text":"Concentrate samples by centrifugal filters and dialyze   at   against dialysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"C4999440222F11ED97F85D023EC78D64","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"332776E01F8111ED8D75E7A4986267BF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5plu2","text":"Check autophosphorylation by Western blotting using a LRRK2 phospho-specific (pT1357) antibody.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8o5u7","text":"Determine protein concentration by SDS-PAGE using Bovine Serum Albumin (BSA) as standard and used without freezing in the liposome tubulation experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: In vitro LRRK2 autophosphorylation
